template.value: User Access Review Admin App

template.query:
SELECT access_reviews.*, employees.name employee, system_roles.name rolename, reviewers.name reviewer_name
FROM access_reviews
LEFT JOIN employees ON employees.email = access_reviews.employee_email
LEFT JOIN system_roles ON system_roles.id = access_reviews.systemrole_id
LEFT JOIN employees reviewers ON reviewers.email = employees.reviewer_email
WHERE review_cycle_id = {{select1.value}}
ORDER BY submitted_at asc, id desc;
SELECT * FROM review_cycles ORDER BY id desc;

SELECT access_reviews.*, employees.name employee, system_roles.name rolename, reviewers.name reviewer_name
FROM access_reviews
LEFT JOIN employees ON employees.email = access_reviews.employee_email
LEFT JOIN system_roles ON system_roles.id = access_reviews.systemrole_id
LEFT JOIN employees reviewers ON reviewers.email = employees.reviewer_email
WHERE review_cycle_id = {{select1.value}}
ORDER BY submitted_at asc, id desc;

SELECT access_reviews.*, employees.name employee, system_roles.name rolename, reviewers.name reviewer_name
FROM access_reviews
LEFT JOIN employees ON employees.email = access_reviews.employee_email
LEFT JOIN system_roles ON system_roles.id = access_reviews.systemrole_id
LEFT JOIN employees reviewers ON reviewers.email = employees.reviewer_email
WHERE 1=1
AND review_cycle_id = {{select1.value}} 
AND ({{!select2.value}} OR STATUS = {{select2.value}} )
AND ({{!select3.value}} OR employees.reviewer_email = {{select3.value}} )
AND ({{!select4.value}} OR action = {{select4.value}} )
ORDER BY submitted_at asc, id desc
;

template.funcBody:
let count = 0;
if ({{select2.value}}) count+=1
if ({{select3.value}}) count+=1
if ({{select4.value}}) count+=1
return count
